[A] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may choose a card in your Opponent's Clock and put it in the Waiting Room. If so, your Opponent puts the top card of their Library in the Clock.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] All your other ::Music:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When you use "ACCELERATE", you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Music:: Character, put it in your hand and discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +500 Power for the turn.

[C] If all your Characters are ::Music::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Raging" is in the Climax Zone, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Music:: Character, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[A] When this attacks, if you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Climax is placed in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[C] For each of your other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your other ::Music:: Characters.
[A] ACCELERATE [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn, this gains +1000 Power and the following ability. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may move up to 2 cards from the top your Library to Stock."

[C] During your turn, if you have 2 or more other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [(3) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] This ability activates up to once per turn. During the turn this is placed from hand to the Stage, when the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, Stand this.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[C] All your other "Pareo, Trust Beyond Doubt" gain +1000 Power.
[A] BOND/"Pareo, Trust Beyond Doubt" [(1)]

[A] At the beginning of your Main Phase, look at the top card of your Library and put it either on top of the Library or in the Waiting Room.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, draw up to 1 card.

[A] ACCELERATE [Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn, this gains the following ability. "[A] When this attacks, search your Library for up to 1 ::Raise a Suilen:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, choose a card in your hand, put it in the Waiting Room, and shuffle your Library."
--None--

[C] For each of your other ::Music:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this card is placed from hand to Stage, choose 1 of your ::Music:: Characters, that Character gains +X Power. X = the number of your ::Music:: Characters * 500.

If you don't have a ::Music:: Character, you cannot play this from hand.
Choose 1 of the following effects and perform it.
"Search your Library for up to 1 ::Music:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library."
"Choose 1 of your Characters, that Character gains +3000 Power for the turn. Put this card in your Stock."
[C] All your Characters gain +2 Soul.

[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Level 2 or higher card, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +1000 Power. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Hello, Happy World!:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this attacks, you may choose a YELLOW card in your Waiting Room and put it on top of your Library.
[A] CX COMBO [Discard 2 cards from hand to the Waiting Room, put this in the Waiting Room] At the end of this card's attack, if "Night Sky Smile" is in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, search your Stock for up to 1 Character other than '"Smile Music" Kokoro Tsurumaki', put it in the Slot this was in, and shuffle your Stock.

[A] When this is played from hand to the Stage, or when this is Reversed in battle, you may look at the top card of your Opponent's Library. (put the viewed card back where it was)
[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Hello, Happy World!:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] If there is a Marker under this, this gains +7000 Power and the following ability. "[A] [(1)] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, Choose 1 of your ::Hello, Happy World!:: Characters and this and Stand and swap them."
[A] When this is played from hand to the Stage or via the effects of '"Smile Music" Kokoro Tsurumaki' to the Stage, you may take up the top of your Clock and put it in the Waiting Room, choose up to 1 Character in your Waiting Room with "Kokoro" in name, and place it faceup under this as Marker.

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If all of your Characters are ::Hello, Happy World!::, this gains +1500 Power and the following ability. "[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you may pay cost. If so, return this to your hand."
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.
[A] [Discard 4 ::Pastel Palettes:: Characters from hand to the Waiting Room] When this attacks, you may pay cost. If so, for the turn this gains +4000 Power and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the total number of different colors of the cards used to pay the cost of this ability. (Damage Cancel can occur)

[C] During your turn, if all your Characters are ::Hello, Happy World!::, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Tonight, When the Stars Shine" is in your Climax Zone, put up to 1 card from top of your Library in your Stock, and choose up to 1 "Hawker Strategy Meeting" in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] On your turn, all of your other ::Hello, Happy World!:: Characters gain +X Power. X equals that Character's Level.
[S] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] Choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to hand.
[S] [Rest this] This ability activates up to once per turn. Choose 1 of your Characters and Stand it.

[C] If there is a Marker under this, this card gains BLUE.
[A] When 1 of your other Characters Reverses its Battle Opponent, choose 1 of your ::Pastel Palettes:: Characters, and that Character gains +2000 for the turn.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Pastel Palettes:: Character, that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn, and if this does not have a Marker under it, Choose a "Maya Yamato, Uniqueness as a Weapon" in your Waiting Room and place it faceup underneath this as Marker.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, if you have a ::Music:: Character, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2500, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, your Opponent may move this to an empty slot in your Front Row.
[A] When you Level-Up, put this in the Waiting Room.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Hello, Happy World!:: Characters, this gains the following ability. "[A] When this card becomes Revered, If the Battle Opponent of this is Cost 0 or less, you may put this in your Opponent's Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in their Waiting Room."
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may return this to your hand. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Hello, Happy World!:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of your ::Hello, Happy World!:: Characters.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in the Waiting Room, and this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 1000 times # of ::Music:: Characters among those cards.
[A] [(1) Put the top card of your Library in your Clock] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Level 1 or lower Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] All your other ::Afterglow:: Characters gain +1500 Power.

If so, for the turn this gains +1500 Power and the following ability. "[A] When this attacks, search your Library for up to 2 total ::Raise a Suilen:: Characters and/or "Yes!! The Strongest!!", show them to your Opponent, put them in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] [Clock] ALARM If this is on the top of your Clock, if you have an ::Afterglow:: Character, at the beginning of your Climax Phase, look at the top 2 cards of your Library, and return them to the top of your Library in any order.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Afterglow:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn. If that Character has ALARM, it gainst +2500 Power for the turn instead.

[C] If there are 5 or more cards in your hand, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] [Clock] ALARM [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] If this is on top of your Clock and you have 2 or more ::Afterglow:: Characters, at the beginning of your Main Phase you may pay cost. If so, choose an ::Afterglow:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to hand.

[C] On your turn, if you have 4 or more colors among the Characters on your Stage, all of your other Characters gain +500 Power.

[C] For each of your other ::Raise a Suilen:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.

If they do, all players search their Library for up to 1 Character, show it to their Opponent, put it in their hands, and shuffle their Libraries. (Please mind your volume and actions)
